message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.IR 

This paper deals with Natural Language Generation (NLG) systems and explores two popular text-generation paradigms - Statistical Machine Translation (SMT) and Deep Learning. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). Additionally, the paper involves the use of neural networks, which makes cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) another likely sub-category. The paper also deals with creativity and originality in language generation, which falls under the purview of cs.LG (Machine Learning). The use of recurrent neural networks (RNNs) also makes cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) a possible sub-category. Finally, the paper involves the evaluation of machine translation and summarization metrics, which falls under the purview of cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
